name: embody
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 to represent a quality or an idea exactly: She embodied good sportsmanship on the playing field.
to include as part of something: Kennett embodied in one man an unusual range of science, music, and religion.

to have and show particular qualities or ideas; represent: Arthur Ashe embodied the ideals of good sportsmanship. embodiment noun [ U ] us

This cruise ship is the embodiment of luxury.
